page.title: 18A DURRINGTON SHOP
page.content: Overington's was establishd in 1793, and has been in the family ever since. It started as a smithy,but now sells and repairs lawnmowers and gardenware. At the back of the shop is a yard selling wood and garden sheds.The shop is made out of stone with a thatched roof.A small hut has been built in which the lawnmowers are repaired. Overington's have much competition from the newly-opened Tesco's store in the area,for the Tesco lawnmower prices are cheaper.Tesco's also have a main shopping centre where people are liable to look for the garden equipment and lawnmowers.Overington's are not near any main shopping centre (like Tesco's) but they still have an advantage for they repair lawnmowers as well as selling them.
